name: Unravel Carbon
long_description: Unravel Carbon is  an enterprise software that helps companies track and reduce their carbon emissions, focusing on Asia, based in Singapore. It is the first AI-powered decarbonization platform in Asia that converts any company’s accounting data into full supply chain carbon data in seconds, generates climate solutions automatically and auto-populates regulatory disclosure reports. PropertyGuru, a Unicorn in Asia, is already using us to achieve their climate goals.
one_liner: Enterprise software for companies to track & reduce their carbon…
